get.summary: Get a smart playlist by ID

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of items per page (minimum: 1, maximum: 100)

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Field to sort tracks by. If not provided, uses the playlist default order.

get.summary: Get tracks for a smart playlist
Get all track URIs for playing a playlist

tagId.description: Tag ID to add to the track

artistGenres.description: Array of genre names from the album artist

firstAdded.description: Date when first track from album was added

lastPlayed.description: Date when any track from album was last played

totalDuration.description: Total duration of all tracks in milliseconds

totalPlayCount.description: Total play count across all tracks

trackCount.description: Number of tracks from this album in library

sourceName.description: Name of the source (e.g., playlist name)

artistGenres.description: Array of genre names from the track artist

albumCount.description: Number of albums by this artist

avgRating.description: Average rating across all rated tracks

firstAdded.description: Date when first track was added

genres.description: Array of genre names associated with this artist

lastPlayed.description: Date when any track was last played

totalDuration.description: Total duration of all tracks in milliseconds

totalPlayCount.description: Total play count across all tracks

trackCount.description: Number of tracks by this artist

tracks.description: Number of liked tracks to sync

totalAlbums.description: Total number of albums in library

totalTracks.description: Total number of tracks in library

current.description: Number of items processed in current phase

errors.description: List of non-fatal errors encountered (deprecated, use errorCount for progress updates)

total.description: Total items to process in current phase

forceRefreshPlaylists.description: Force refresh all playlists, ignoring snapshot-based change detection. By default, playlists are only synced if their snapshot ID has changed since the last sync. Set to true to re-sync all playlists regardless of changes.

syncAlbums.description: Include saved albums in sync. When false, only liked tracks and playlists will be synced.

syncLikedTracks.description: Include liked tracks (saved songs) in sync. When false, only albums and playlists will be synced.

syncPlaylists.description: Include playlists in sync. When false, only liked tracks and albums will be synced.

clickedIndex.description: Index of clicked track in current page (0-based)

contextId.description: ID of the context (playlist, album, artist, etc.)

deviceId.description: Spotify device ID to play on

search.description: Search query string to filter tracks

startPosition.description: Position to start playing from (deprecated - use pagination fields)

daysValue.description: For date rules - number of days
